trends: There has been one other sighting in Troy and Hawkpoint
There was one other sighting in Troy and Hawkpoint on or around October 15th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing out side faceing west looking at an object that I belived to be abright star, I noticed white, redm and green light emmiting from this object, Iwhent back in side, and heard Lincoln County Sheriff dispatch A call of a U.F.Oin the Hawk Point area 8 miles west of Troy MO.63379, I told My wife Patriciaabout the object in the western Sky, and we both went outside to look. I carry apair of 7x35 binoculars in my truk, at which time I was observing this objectthrou them. This object had been stationary for over 20 mimutes, as I wasobserving this object, I could hear a jet liner flying towards the object, Icould see the jet liner was goint to pass with in 7 miles of the object, whenthe jet liner came closer to this object, the object whent dark, as the jetliner passed by, after about 4 seconds, the object reapeared lower in thewestern horizon still stationary, the object would shut down its lights, andmove ferther west, light it self up again, until i lost sight of it below thewestern horizon, my Wife observed most of this with the naked eye.
